metadata.title: CVE-2024-27051 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cpufreq: brcmstb-avs-cpufreq: add check for cpufreq_cpu_get's return valuecpufreq_cpu_get may return NULL. To avoid NULL-dereference check itand return 0 in case of error.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
